settings.title: Better oral care, based on your biology
settings.desc: Solve your oral health issues like halitosis, gum inflammation, and tooth decay with root cause testing and personalized coaching and care.

settings.title: Preventive
settings.desc: Identify the root-cause of conditions and understand your risk before they become problems

settings.title: Precise
settings.desc: Take the guesswork out of your oral care with targeted recommendations that make an immediate impact.

settings.title: Personalized
settings.desc: Get a tailored program based on your test results & personal preference along with 1:1 coaching.

settings.title: At bristle, we believe in empowering individuals with the knowledge and tools to get better control of their oral health.

settings.top_desc: Get an in-depth report detailing the bacteria in your mouth and its impact to your health.
settings.title: Get started with our at-home saliva test
settings.desc:
Dental checkups only look for existing problems like cavities or gum disease. Instead of looking for symptoms to treat, Bristle analyzes your saliva to identify the bacteria in your mouth that cause those symptoms. By detecting these bacteria at the earliest stages we can help you prevent the onset of disease.

Our test was developed from the ground-up using clinical research and your results are compared against thousands of other samples.

settings.top_desc: Receive personalized oral care and diet recommendations based on your results.
settings.title: Turn insights into action with a personalized program
settings.desc:
Science shows that just “brushing and flossing” doesn’t work the same for everyone. If it did, why would cavities and gum disease still be the most common conditions on the planet?

We’ll show you the right hygiene techniques, dietary choices, and oral products to use based on your test results and goals.

settings.top_desc: Review your program and access ongoing support through our team of licensed hygienists.
settings.title: Reach your goals with ongoing support from your Bristle coach
settings.desc:
Don’t wait 6 months for your next checkup. Review your results, ask questions, and stay accountable with dedicated oral health specialists and licensed hygienists.

We’re here for you 24/7.
settings.image_text:
Iman is a licensed oral health expert who’s here to support you along the way. She will:

  • Review your progress
  • Answer oral health questions
  • Explain your microbial results in the context of your unique goals and symptoms

We’ll reach out after you receive your results to coordinate your complimentary 1:1 consultation. In the meantime, you can reach out to Iman with questions anytime.

settings.top_desc: Watch your results measurably improve throughout the year by testing every 3 or 6 months.
settings.title: Measure your progress and optimize your routine
settings.desc: At the end of the program you’ll re-test your oral microbiome to see your improvement! We’ll update your care plan based on your individual response to different recommendations.

settings.title: Oral health isn’t rocket science- it’s biology
settings.desc:
The oral microbiome is the collection of all the microbes that live in your mouth. Some microbes help break down food, fight off infection, and keep our teeth and gums healthy, while others cause damage to our mouths and bodies. When your oral microbiome is out of balance, it leads to conditions like bad breath, tooth decay and gum disease.

The oral microbiome also affects overall health. Oral conditions like gum disease are risk factors for conditions like cardiovascular disease and diabetes.

Making small changes to your diet, hygiene and oral products based on your unique biology helps you achieve better oral health through a balanced oral microbiome!

settings.title:
Identify and treat the root
cause of conditions, including:
settings.desc:
• Chronic bad breath
  • Tooth decay
  • Inflamed gums
  • Gut dysbiosis
  • Gum recession
  • Oral thrush
  • Tonsil stones
  • Burning mouth syndrome
settings.bottom_title: Explore the oral microbiome’s impact on your oral and overall health

settings.title: Langford
settings.desc_title: I'm thrilled to have discovered them.
settings.desc: I found Bristle while taking steps to fix some recurring gut issues, I wasn't aware of how connected your mouth flora and gut flora are until I began following the Bristle regiment and now my overall digestive and oral health are better than I even thought possible...

settings.title: Donna
settings.desc_title: I absolutely love Bristle, it's a game changer.
settings.desc: I absolutely love Bristle, it's a game changer. My test results gave me detailed results with actionable easy steps to take to get my oral health back on track. The entire team is very helpful, responsive and kind!

settings.title: Olivia
settings.desc_title: I am so grateful for Bristle
settings.desc: Bristle has been such an incredible resource to help me better understand the source of bad breath and my overall health. I have been struggling to combat bad breath for over a decade and was unable to find a solution. After visits with my dentist, G.I. Specialist, and ENT...

settings.title: CLIA Certified Lab
settings.desc: Our lab is CLIA-certified (Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments). This means they have to meet high standards to obtain both state and federal certifications and submit themselves to regular inspections.

settings.title: Backed by Science
settings.desc: Our test was developed through a research study with the University of Pacific School of Dentistry under an independent review board, and our science is backed by decades of research and over 200 scientific studies.

settings.title: Secure Data
settings.desc: Bristle is HIPAA compliant and we take extensive measures to keep your data 100% secure. We use state-of-the-art encryption to ensure your data is stored securely, and give you control over your personal data.

settings.heading: Bristle is contributing to the science of oral health - find out more about how we support oral microbiome research and how our test really works.

settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Real people, real improvements
settings.desc: We're committed to helping you improve your oral health.
settings.left_desc:
“When I took my second Bristle test six months later, my jaw dropped. I haven’t had to have any work done at the dentist since I started down this new path, just cleanings! It’s unbelievable!! I honestly can’t thank Bristle enough.”

Wendy, 48
